name: Battle of the Sun: Apep's Revenge
name_original: Battle of the Sun: Apep's Revenge
description:
With the power of the sun behind you, the  Egyptian God Ra, has to come up against your greatest opponent yet, Apep, the Great Serpent! Do you have what it takes to win this battle?

Themed off of a 1st year project from university which was a top down shooter, originally made in Animate.

(Link to process of creation coming shorty)

Movement: Left and right arrow keys

Shoot: Spacebar

Once all enemies are down, shoot the sun to move onto the next wave.
